pullRequest.title: doc: unify homepage of https://spoon.gforge.inria.fr and Github

nodes.bodyText:

            ### Hare there snapshots versions deployed somewhere?
          
          
            
            ### Are there snapshots versions deployed somewhere?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -5,6 +5,26 @@ keywords: frequently asked questions, FAQ, question and answer, collapsible sect
 
 ## Practical Information
 
+### Hare there snapshots versions deployed somewhere?

nodes.bodyText: Can't we keep these links toward videos? (I mean we could add them on the home page rather than deleting them from the readme.)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -78,16 +78,59 @@ mvn test
 
 ### Download
 
-The download information is at <http://spoon.gforge.inria.fr/>.
+Latest version: <https://search.maven.org/remote_content?g=fr.inria.gforge.spoon&a=spoon-core&v=LATEST&c=jar-with-dependencies> - [Javadoc](http://spoon.gforge.inria.fr/mvnsites/spoon-core/spoon-core/apidocs/index.html)
 
-### Ecosystem
+Maven:
 
-See <http://spoon.gforge.inria.fr/ecosystem.html>
+```xml
+<dependency>
+    <groupId>fr.inria.gforge.spoon</groupId>
+    <artifactId>spoon-core</artifactId>
+    <version>{{site.spoon_release}}</version>
+</dependency>
+```
 
-## On Youtube
